item.title: CVE-2024-27322|2024-04-29T20:11:23.096Z -- The R Project -- R
item.description: Deserialization of untrusted data can occur in the R statistical programming language, on any version starting at 1.4.0 up to and not including 4.4.0, enabling a maliciously crafted RDS (R Data Serialization) formatted file or R package to run arbitrary code on an end userâ€™s system when interacted with.
